Package adrenaline.network

Class Lobby

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.network.Lobby
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimerCallBack
    public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimerCallBack
    This class is used to gather all the clients waiting for other players before starting a new game.

      • timerCallBack

        public void timerCallBack()
        Callback function for game creation time out. If there's at least three players in this lobby the timer starts and gets interrupted upon reaching 5 players in total, otherwise it continues and after ending a new game gets created.
        Specified by:
        timerCallBack in interface TimerCallBack

        Parameters:
        nickname - of player
